body.instruction: Select the image of each emperor to learn more about what they did during their reign.

front.content: Tiberius Bust©Prisma / ImageQuest 2021
front.textversion: Image: Bronze bust of Tiberius, found in Tiermes (Spain)

back.content:
Reign: 14 CE–37 CE.

I am known for:
  • being adopted by Augustus Caesar
  • continuing to stabilize Rome under the Augustan agenda
  • countryside growing in wealth
  • living in the Villa Jovis on the island of Capri
